name: vscode-twitch-coder
description: Allow viewers to interact with your VS Code editor.

scripts.compile: rimraf ./out && tsc -p ./ --noEmit && copyfiles -au 1 ./src/**/*.html out/ && bun bundle

commands.title: Request a Highlight from the Twitch Chat Client

view == twitchCoderTreeView || view == twitchCoderTreeView-explorer || view == twitchCoderTreeView-debug

twitchCoder.channels.description: A comma separated list of channel name(s) to connect to on Twitch. Example: `simek` or for multiple channels: `simek, dev_spajus`.

twitchCoder.highlightColor.markdownDescription: Background color of the decoration. Use `rgba()` and define transparent background colors to play well with other decorations. Example: `rgba(169,112,255,0.8)`.

twitchCoder.highlightFontColor.markdownDescription: Font color of the decoration. Use `rgba()` and define transparent background colors to play well with other decorations. Example: `white`.

twitchCoder.highlightBorder.description: CSS border styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Example: `1px solid #d7bdff`.

twitchCoder.nickname.description: The username the chat bot should use when joining a Twitch channel.

twitchCoder.autoConnect.description: Whether or not the chat bot should try connecting automatically when VS Code starts.

twitchCoder.announceBot.title: Twitch Coder
twitchCoder.announceBot.description: Whether or not the chat bot should announce its joining or leaving the chat room.

twitchCoder.joinMessage.description: The message the chat bot will say when joining a chat room.

twitchCoder.leaveMessage.default: Twitch Coder has left the building!
twitchCoder.leaveMessage.description: The message the chat bot will say when leaving a chat room.

twitchCoder.requiredBadges.markdownDescription: A list of badges required to use the highlighter command. The use must have at least one of these badges to use the command. Leave blank for no requirement. Example: `moderator, subscriber, vip`.

items.errorMessage: Expected one of the following: `admin`, `bits`, `broadcaster`, `global_admin`, `moderator`, `subscriber`, `staff`, `turbo`, `premium` or `follower`.

twitchCoder.unhighlightOnDisconnect.description: Unhighlight all lines when disconnected from the chat service.

twitchCoder.showHighlightsInActivityBar.description: Show the Highlights icon in the activity bar to display the tree view.

twitchCoder.usageTip.description: A tip shared by the bot when a user chats: `!line`.
